name: Point N Time Software
tag_list: cloud-software, mobile-applications, salesforce-appexchange, sales-strategy, enterprise-software, complex-sales, large-account-management, opportunity-management, crm
overview: Point N Time Software, provides cloud and mobile applications for individuals, small, medium and enterprise customers. The flag ship product is Meeting Mapper iPad App is a visual meeting tool to provide the user with an intuitive and easy to use mobile application. With the popularity of Meeting Mapper, Point N Time has created Meeting Mapper Fierce the only visual sales tool for SaleForce.com users. Meeting Mapper Fierce is the only strategic “selling” app with color-coded roles plus the stance for each contact for account planning and qualification. Meeting Mapper Fierce is a patent pending sales intelligence tool for the Salesforce.com AppExchange cloud-computing marketplace. Meeting Mapper Fierce is a visual strategic selling tool for sales calls, account management and opportunity assessment. Meeting Mapper also tracks goals, objectives and detailed notes for each meeting. Each meeting is then assigned to an opportunity and creates account activity notes within Salesforce.com
